abstract: Federal Highway Admin data shows that American motorists drove estimated 237.3 billion miles in January 2015, increase of 4.9 percent from year-ago period; it is 11th consecutive month of year-to-year growth.
lead_paragraph: Motorists drove an estimated 237.3 billion miles in January, marking the 11th consecutive month of year-to-year growth.

headline.main: American Motorists Logged Record Miles in January
headline.print_headline: American Motorists Logged Record Miles In January

snippet: Motorists drove an estimated 237.3 billion miles in January, marking the 11th consecutive month of year-to-year growth.
